channel.title: spiritual growth on Drunken Sage
channel.description: Recent content in spiritual growth on Drunken Sage

item.title: Loved, Reality and the Time of Transition
item.author: drunkensage82@gmail.com (Drunken Sage)
item.description: Bernhard Guenther does a great job breaking down the false love/light narrative that is so wide spread through the new age and spiritual awakening movement.

item.title: Becoming Who You Are Meant to Be
item.author: drunkensage82@gmail.com (Drunken Sage)
item.description: I have recently come across the work of Bernhard Guenther and Laura Matsue and have been enjoying their podcasts and perspective on the soul awakening/enlightenment journey. This particular podcast episode hits home for myself, as I recently began to understand just how much the false “I” or ego I was actually dealing with. I spent years after my awakening gorging myself on all the spiritual information I could get my hands on.
